group_1.textLeft: So Ballentine's Day is coming up soon!
I was wondering if you guys could help me out @with it.
...What is it?@What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: Valentine's Day...?

group_1.textCenter: Where did you learn about that?!

group_1.textLeft: ...You don't have to act so surprised.

group_1.textRight: But still, Valentine's Day?
I never realized the Tokime Village celebrated it...

group_1.textLeft: Oh no, Natsuki told me about it earlier today.
So it was Natsuki, then.

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness, that's a relief.@We should be safe in that case.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
...What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Well, see, we were just worried you'd have a weird understanding of it...
We had no idea what you'd learned.
I don't know what would have happened if you'd completely misunderstood the occasion...

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]Hmm...
From what I understand, Ballentine's Day is a @special holiday for girls.
If a girl loves someone, she gives them shockolate @and confesses her feelings.
The holiday is about giving people gifts to express @your love and admiration,
and things like that.
So how was it? @Did I get it?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's exactly right!
Yep! Nailed it!

group_1.textLeft: Phew!
Anyway...
Since it's such a big occasion, I'd like to participate...
To summarize all that,
on Ballentine's Day,
I'd like to invite the one I love on an outing to Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: I get it...
Because of everything with the clan, @you guys must never have a day to yourselves.
It'd be great if we could help make that happen!
I wholeheartedly agree.
Making homemade chocolates... @Going on a date in Kamihama...

group_1.textLeft: Sounds fun, right?

group_1.textRight: It's important that you two strengthen your bonds @for the sake of the clan.

group_1.textLeft: But...
There's so much I don't understand,@so I need you guys to help me.

group_1.textRight: Of course we'll help you. Right, Charu?
Charu?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry!
I mean, yeah, of course I'll help!
I'm glad you will.
Though you looked like you'd lost focus, Charu...@are you okay?

group_1.textRight: To tell you the truth...
I think I'm gonna go for it and ask her out, too!

group_1.textLeft: That's great!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but I don't know if it's gonna happen...@The competition is pretty fierce.

group_1.textLeft: But isn't Ballentine's Day the day we're supposed to take charge and act on our feelings?
Don't be such a coward, Charu!

group_1.textRight: You're right...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Natsuki would be shocked if she heard us talking @like this.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*
In any case, we'll have to prepare some chocolate @and a nice plan for your date.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: I have a suggestion, actually.
Why don't we gather the whole clan and make chocolate together?

group_1.textLeft: Wait, all of us...?

group_1.textRight: You see, on Valentine's Day, you can also give @something called "friendship chocolate."
In essence, tradition allows for friends to exchange chocolates as well.

group_1.textLeft: So we can make them for everyone in the clan!

group_1.textRight: Yes. They've been supporting us every single day, @so it's our way of showing thanks.

group_1.textLeft: "Friendship shockolate..."
Sounds good! @Let's do it!

group_1.textRight: Excellent.

group_1.textLeft: Then let's use tomorrow to get what we need!

group_1.textRight: From what I understand, we'll need special supplies.
Why don't we pick them up at the shopping mall?

group_1.textLeft: The shopping mall, huh...
(That'd line up perfectly - I've been needing some @new clothes.)
Alright, we'll head over there tomorrow!
